A new TV tuner ({tunerMake} {tunerModel}: A new TV tuner ({tunerMake} {tunerModel}) has been found! Plex DVR is the easiest way to record your favourite shows!
All Tuners are Currently in Use: All tuners are currently in use
All set! Your Plex Media Server is worki: All set! Your Plex Media Server is working hard to find your media and make it beautiful. Grab the Plex app for all your favourite devices to get the most out of Plex and start streaming everywhere!
All {1} settings and customization will: All {1} settings and customisation will be reset and restored to their default state.
All {productName} settings and customiza: All {productName} settings and customisation will be reset and restored to their default state. Other {productName} instances will not be affected.
All {productName} settings and customisation will be reset and restored to their default state. This will affect other {productName} instances.
Analyzes all the media files in the libr: Analyses all the media files in the library. The analysis captures information about the media which helps Plex decide how to optimally play back the media.
Any {1} settings and customization made: Any {1} settings and customisation made in this {1} instance will not be synchronised with other {1} instances.  This is because we have detected you have previously saved settings from a newer version of {1}.
Are you sure you want to delete this ver: Are you sure you want to delete this version? You can enable it again in Optimised Versions Settings.
Changes to {productName} settings and cu: Changes to {productName} settings and customisation will no longer synchronise with other {productName} instances.
Check the status in {1}Optimized Version: Check the status in {1}Optimised Versions Settings{2}.
Choose \"Optimize...\" on items in your: Choose "Optimise..." on items in your library and optimised versions will appear here.
Choose what you’d like to have in your s: Choose what you’d like to have in your sidebar navigation menu. (You’ll always have easy access to everything, so you can make changes and further customise your menu later.)
Community Supported Tuners opens up your: Community Supported Tuners opens up your Plex account to access a larger variety of DVR tuners, many of which have been tested and are supported by the community. If your tuner hasn't been recognised by Plex DVR and you're up for a little adventure, this will allow you to use unsupported tuners that have not been tested by Plex.
Conversions for sync and media optimizat: Conversions for sync and media optimisation will appear here.
Currently all {1} settings and customiza: Currently all {1} settings and customisation apply to this {1} instance only.
Currently all {1} settings and customisation are synchronised with other {1} instances.
Help us out by following {1}our guide{2}: Help us out by following {1}our guide{2} to naming and organising your media.
Hooked on home automation? With a Plex P: Hooked on home automation? With a Plex Pass, you can set up "webhooks" - Have Plex dim the lights when you start a movie, or send a tweet after you finish an episode of your favourite TV show.
If this is unexpected, see our {openLink: If this is unexpected, see our {openLink}home screen customisation tips{closeLink}. If you removed everything and want it all back, choosing Reset Customisation below will reset your sidebar navigation and home screen layout to the default state.
Make sure your device is connected to yo: Make sure your device is connected to your antenna or cable and click 'scan channels'.
Manage your completed conversions in {1}: Manage your completed conversions in {1}Optimised Versions Settings{2}.
Manage your optimized versions in {1}Opt: Manage your optimised versions in {1}Optimised Versions Settings{2}.
Optimized Versions requires Plex Media S: Optimised Versions requires Plex Media Server {1} or later.
Organize, beautify, stream, and share yo: Organise, beautify, stream, and share your personal collection of movies, TV, music, and photos anywhere, on all your devices. To get started, download our free Plex Media Server software on the device where you store your media.
Other viewers are watching ads. Playback: Other viewers are watching adverts. Playback will resume automatically when they're done.
Play your media on any screen with your: Play your media on any screen with your favourite Plex app
Plex can use your pinned sources and oth: Plex can use your pinned sources and other hints to provide home screen content that is valuable to you.  This will reset any home screen customisation you have made.
Plex is able to provide free-to-watch mo: Plex is able to provide free-to-watch movies and shows by displaying a modest number of adverts before and during playback. While it is not possible to opt out of these adverts, we can provide you the best and most relevant advertising experience if you agree to the terms below.
Plex organizes your media into libraries: Plex organises your media into libraries. You can add as many libraries as you want, and you can have multiple libraries with the same type.
Plex scans your media, automatically org: Plex scans your media, automatically organises it, and makes it beautiful

With Plex Pass and a digital tuner, you: With Plex Pass and a digital tuner, you can record over-the-air broadcast TV and watch your favourite shows, movies, news, and sports on any device, anywhere in the world. Cut the cord and love TV again.
With a TIDAL subscription you can add Al: With a TIDAL subscription you can add albums, artists, tracks and videos to My TIDAL to keep track of your favourite music.
